text: 2|58|niṅṅaḷ ī paṭṭaṇattil pravēśikkuvin. aviṭe niṅṅaḷkk iṣṭamuḷḷiṭattuninn yathēṣṭaṁ bhakṣiccukeāḷḷuvin. talakuniccukeāṇṭ vātil kaṭakkukayuṁ paścāttāpa vacanaṁ paṟayukayuṁ ceyyuvin. niṅṅaḷuṭe pāpaṅṅaḷ nāṁ peāṟuttutarikayuṁ, salpravr̥ttikaḷ ceyyunnavarkk kūṭutal kūṭutal anugrahaṅṅaḷ nalkukayuṁ ceyyunnatāṇ enn nāṁ paṟañña sandarbhavuṁ (ōrkkuka)
